title: How to learn fast reading notes and books - Quora

response.answer_text: I am a fast reader. I always have been. I can’t really explain how I do it, but when I read, I don’t read letter by letter or word by word. It’s as though I am able to take in and comprehend several words at once. It’s hard to explain and I have no idea how I do it, but I have done it all my life. So I can read really, really fast.
